reporter_caption.center: DUFRENE v. DIXIE AUTO INSURANCE, 378 So.2d 1390 (La. 1980)

caption.center: ADAM DUFRENE v. DIXIE AUTO INSURANCE ET AL.

opinion.posture: In re Adam Dufrene et al. applying for certiorari, or writ of review, to the Court ofWest Page 1391 Appeal, Fourth Circuit. Parish of St. Charles.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] WATSON, J., would grant the writ.
